name: Oversight; rate regulation
text:
(a)  The commissioner shall retain full regulatory jurisdiction pursuant to the authority granted to the commissioner by part II of article 2 of chapter 431 over all insurers and qualified plans and qualified dental plans included in the connector.
     (b)  Rate regulation for qualified plans and qualified dental plans included in the connector shall be pursuant to applicable state and federal law. [L 2011, c 205, pt of §3]
